chapters.title: Chapter 1: Embers of the Unknown
chapters.subtitle: A flicker in the dark
chapters.description: The world doesn't always announce the beginning of something important. Sometimes it starts in silence, in stillness, in the unnoticed breath before change. What matters is whether we’re awake enough to feel it.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: A Name Among Shadows
